channel.title: Oxford University Bans Spotify For P2P Use
channel.description:
Oxford University has decided to ban the music streaming application Spotify because it uses P2P technology. Although Spotify is completely legal, the University has banned the application because the underlying P2P technology allegedly turns it into a bandwidth hog.
[URL=http://torrentfreak.com/oxford-university-bans-spotify-for-p2p-use-100118/]more[/url]

item.title: Oxford University Bans Spotify For P2P Use
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Honestly, their network, their rules. I can understand it if it is actually degrading performance all over the network. However they probably did it just because they are stupid.

Read full topic
